rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: Spacious entrance with Vastu aligned placement for positive energy flow.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Open plan living area that doubles as a social space, designed in Brutalist style with exposed concrete elements.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the kitchen, allowing for casual dining and family interactions.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Functional kitchen with modular layout incorporating local materials and cost-effective solutions.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom on the ground floor for privacy, integrating Vastu principles in room orientation.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Dedicated guest bedroom following local building norms and efficient space usage.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: A dedicated home office with proper lighting and sound insulation, aligned for Vastu to enhance productivity.

openings.description: Main entrance door ensuring proper Vastu alignment.
Large windows to ensure natural light and ventilation in line with Brutalist design aesthetics.
Window placement to ensure proper air circulation and adherence to local norms.
Interior door facilitating movement between rooms.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom (Upper)
rooms.description: Enhanced master bedroom on the first floor for better view and ventilation.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Additional bedroom ensuring privacy with Vastu alignment.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Smaller bedroom designed efficiently to maximize space usage.

openings.description: Sturdy staircase connecting ground and first floor in a cost-effective manner.
Window for natural light and ventilation on the first floor.

garden.description: Large garden surrounding the townhouse with native plant species, ensuring a balance of nature.

features.name: Perimeter Wall
features.description: Low-budget solution using local materials to delineate the property.
